actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 167 (k) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Extends for two years that provision of the Internal Revenue Code which allows expenses relating to the rehabilitation of low income rental housing to be depreciated over a 60 month period (rather than the useful life of the property). Increases the maximum amount of expenditures which can be depreciated in such manner from $15,000 to $20,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 167 (k) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
